name: 東方無許可の時空 ~ 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐕𝐨𝐢𝐝 (NiTV)
name_original: 東方無許可の時空 ~ 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐕𝐨𝐢𝐝 (NiTV)
description:
東方無許可の時空 ~ 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐕𝐨𝐢𝐝 (NiTV) 1.00a
Presented by Team Perle de l'Extrême-Orient

The Dream Sumireko was unsure why she had to went through numerous encounters in a dimension so call "Void". Will she eventually figure out how to return to the dream work and execute her schemes? There's only one way to find out.

The game is a spellcard exhibition of characters made by fans which are credited and permissioned. The game is non-commercial and is available for everyone to enjoy as a concept. Please note that the script content large content, so there might be chances of fault arising, we'll try our best to fix it asap.

[Coming Up Version 1.01a update] : Some changes will be made in several days regarding some credits, a credit node will also be added outside
